app.title: End of the World
app.subtitle: Imagine the world is ending in 90 days. What would you do?

startScreen.title: End of the World
description: The world as you know it ends in 90 days. What if anything was possible?
Let your answers surprise you. Think beyond the obvious.

endScreen.title: A New Beginning
endScreen.subtitle: Don't wait until the end to start a brand new beginning.

questions.question: Where would you go first? Why?
Who would you nominate to lead your tribe? Why them?
You have a survival backpack. What are you filling it with?
Would your sex life change? Explain.
What's the craziest thing you'd spend your savings on?
What would you stop worrying about?
If you could have an infinite supply of one thing, what would it be?
What would you leave in a time capsule for the next inhabitants of Earth?
What's one thing you'd finally try that you've always been too embarrassed to do?
Describe your ideal 'end of the world' party in detail.
If you could broadcast one message to the entire world, what would it be?
If aliens offered to save you and one person, who would you bring and why?
